com.cmput301w18t26.taskit

Class TaskItFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w18t26.taskit.TaskItFile

  • public class TaskItFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles file I/O for the application - read/write {bids, tasks, users}
    See Also:
    TaskItData, TaskItServer, TaskItSync
